sources.title: The Meanest Man in Texas | Full Drama Movie | The True Clyde Thompson Story
sources.description:
Based on the Best Seller, "The Meanest Man in Texas" is the true story of Clyde Thompson. After shooting two men in self-defense, Clyde is convicted of murder and sentenced to death. Just hours before execution, the Governor spares him and ships him to the Texas Prison Farm to serve hard labor, where he gains the moniker "The Meanest Man in Texas". Clyde's journey consists of some life-changing highs and lows, but ultimately leads him to redemption.

**The film is under non-exclusive license from Artist View Entertainment Inc.  All rights reserved**
2017.  Stars: Mateus Ward, Jamie McShane, Alexandra Bard

metadata.Plot: En route to visit their grandfather's grave (which has apparently been ritualistically desecrated), five teenagers drive past a slaughterhouse, pick up (and quickly drop) a sinister hitch-hiker, eat some delicious home-cured meat at a roadside gas station, before ending up at the old family home... where they're plunged into a never-ending nightmare as they meet a family of cannibals who more than make up in power tools what they lack in social skills...
metadata.Actors: Marilyn Burns, Edwin Neal, Allen Danziger
